system.description:
An heir of Siberys manifests a Siberys dragonmark—the rarest and most powerful form of a dragonmark—across his entire body. This grants the heir of Siberys a major @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-abilities.Item.LxomYrz417VxjMhA]{Innate Power} that can be activated once per day. If the power specifies one or more Power Modifiers, the power is always activated with those Power Modifiers unless stated otherwise. Using an Epic Modifier for this power does not require the @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-edges.Item.u6T4PbGGO1rmF2F0]{Epic Mastery} Edge.

Mark

Major Powers

Mark of Detection

Boost Trait (Moment of Prescience, self only)

Mark of Finding

Locate (Discern Location)

Mark of Handling

Awaken or summon animal (Increased Trait ×3)

Mark of Healing

Healing (Mass Healing)

Mark of Hospitality

Teleport (Refuge)

Mark of Making

Conjure item (Durable, True Creation, and (optionally) Major Creation)

Mark of Passage

Teleport (Greater Teleport)

Mark of Scribing

Illusion (documents with Duration, Permanent, and Strong)

Mark of Sentinel

Mind blank

Mark of Shadow

Scrying (Greater Scrying)

Mark of Storm

Elemental manipulation (Weather)

Mark of Warding

Barrier (Damage (solid wall), Deadly, Hardened, and Size)

requirements.value: Heroic, any ancestry of a dragonmarked lineage, d12+ in any two skills, cannot have Aberrant Dragonmark or Dragonmark

mutation.name: Barrier (Damage (solid wall), Deadly, Hardened, and Size)
